name: Beef Biryani (Personal Dish)
preparationSteps: Marinate beef with yogurt and spices for 2 hours
Cook rice until 70% done
Layer rice and meat in a heavy pot
Add saffron milk and fried onions between layers
Seal pot with dough and cook on low heat for 30 minutes

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
preparationSteps: Cream butter and sugars
Add eggs and vanilla
Mix dry ingredients separately
Combine wet and dry ingredients
Fold in chocolate chips
Drop spoonfuls onto baking sheet
Bake at 375°F for 10-12 minutes

name: Japanese Ramen
preparationSteps: Simmer pork belly in soy sauce, mirin and sake for 2 hours
Make broth by simmering chicken stock with garlic and ginger
Cook noodles according to package
Assemble bowl with noodles, broth, sliced pork, egg halves and garnishes

name: Spicy Thai Green Curry
preparationSteps: Heat coconut milk in a wok
Add green curry paste and stir until fragrant
Add chicken and cook until no longer pink
Add remaining ingredients except basil
Simmer for 15 minutes
Add basil leaves just before serving

name: Classic French Omelette
preparationSteps: Beat eggs with salt and pepper
Heat butter in non-stick pan
Pour in eggs and stir gently with a fork
When nearly set, fold omelette in half
Garnish with chives

name: Köttbullar
preparationSteps: Soak breadcrumbs in milk
Mix ground beef with soaked breadcrumbs, finely chopped onion, egg, and spices
Form small meatballs
Brown meatballs in butter
Make gravy with remaining butter, flour, beef broth and cream
Simmer meatballs in gravy for 10-15 minutes
